data.title: Bulgarian Split Squat
instruction: Stand in front of a bench or chair
Place one foot on the bench behind you
Lower your hips until your front thigh is parallel to the ground
Push through the front heel to return to standing
Switch legs and repeat

data.title: Goblet Squat
instruction: Hold a weight close to your chest with both hands
Stand with feet shoulder-width apart
Lower into a squat, keeping the weight close to your chest
Push through your heels to stand back up
Repeat for the desired number of repetitions

data.title: Pistol Squat
instruction: Stand on one leg with the other leg extended straight in front of you
Lower into a squat on the supporting leg
Keep your core engaged and chest up
Push through your heel to stand back up
Repeat on the other leg

data.title: Cossack Squat
instruction: Stand with feet wide apart
Shift your weight to one leg and lower into a side squat
Keep the other leg extended straight with the toes pointing up
Push through the bent leg to return to standing
Alternate sides and repeat
